titlealts.searchtitle: NHS Business Definition: Internet Enabled Therapy Integrated Software Engine - Description

body.p: An Internet Enabled Therapy Integrated Software Engine is a MEDICAL DEVICE .

An Internet Enabled Therapy Integrated Software Engine is software that enables information, such as progress notes and outcomes, to be shared electronically between an Internet Enabled Therapy Programme and a PATIENT 's clinical record.

The use of an Internet Enabled Therapy Integrated Software Engine reduces the burden and associated risk of duplicate data input and can provide real time feedback regarding the efficiency of Internet Enabled Therapy for the PATIENT .
